net.trajano.app.test

Class PersistedBeansTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.trajano.app.test.PersistedBeansTest

  • public class PersistedBeansTest
extends Object
    This is an integration test to test the PersistedBeans class. This uses an embedded Derby database and EclipseLink to test the bean. This is useful for debugging SQLs that are generated by JPA.
    Author:
    Archimedes Trajano

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createJpaObjects()
      Creates the entity manager and entity manager factory.
      void dropJpaObjects()
      Closes the JPA objects and drops the in-memory database.
      void testBean() 
      void testBeanAgain()
      Run the test again, this ensures there are no records in the database for each test.
